about_the_game:
Official Soundtrack for Get Dis Money. 8 Tracks of 8-bit, chiptune loops. All Made in the Pico-8 Sound editor.

Soundtrack Directory: "SteamGetDisMoneyLocalFiles"/sountrack

Format: Mp3

Track Listing:

1. Main Menu - 1:09
2. World 1 - 1:16
3. Boss - 1:16
4. Game Over - 1:23
5. World 2 - 1:14
6. FILE_NOT_FOUND - 1:24
7. World 3 - 1:16
8. Final Boss - 1:26

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 8 / Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 32 bit 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: 64bit 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Get Dis Money - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Official Soundtrack for Get Dis Money. 8 Tracks of 8-bit, chiptune loops. All Made in the Pico-8 Sound editor.
